block.gimme-that-gimmick.meteorite.toolt: A meteorite that enables Deoxys to change its form
cobblemon.battle.activate.gmaxcentiferno: %1$s became trapped in the fiery vortex!

message.overlay.gimme-that-gimmick.dna.n: You need Kyurem in your party to use this item.
message.overlay.gimme-that-gimmick.graci: Your %1$s is now in Land forme.
Your %1$s is now in Sky forme.
message.overlay.gimme-that-gimmick.mega_: You already have a Mega Pokémon.
You cannot perform this action in battle.
message.overlay.gimme-that-gimmick.mirro: Your %1$s is now in Incarnate forme.
Your %1$s is now in Therian forme.
message.overlay.gimme-that-gimmick.no_sh: This player is not holding a team sheet.
message.overlay.gimme-that-gimmick.no_st: Your Pokémon is not holding its Mega Stone.
message.overlay.gimme-that-gimmick.orico: Your %1$s has been transformed into its Baile forme.
Your %1$s has been transformed into its Pa'u forme.
Your %1$s has been transformed into its Pom Pom forme.
Your %1$s has been transformed into its Sensu forme.
message.overlay.gimme-that-gimmick.priso: Your %1$s has been restrained into its Confined forme.
Your %1$s has been released into its Unbound forme.
message.overlay.gimmethatgimmick.tera.no: You need 50 shards to change the Tera type
message.overlay.gimmethatgimmick.tera.se: Set the Tera type of %1$s to %2$s
